title: 72. Embodying Your Worth
description:
Hey sis!

Have you ever heard the phrase "know your worth" and felt like you didn't really "know" it? Or maybe you felt like even though you have an idea of the life you want or how you want things to show up in your relationships, they just... don't. I've been there! Listen in on this episode where we talk all about embodying your worth and why it's different from "knowing" it.

Click here to join the waitlist for my upcoming Self-love course to get $150 off! Hurry! Waitlist closes September 25th***, 2020!


Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
